name: Cake: Free, for all!
description:
Play a day in the life of a successful cake food truck owner! The popularity of your success lies within the way you deliver your goods to the customer.  Make as many customers happy by throwing cakes at their heads. Be aware though, customers don't like to wait for too long.

Controls are: A and D to move from left to right and left mouse-button to throw a cake. Make sure to not get hit by angry customers as this will and your run.

This is my first Trijam submission and has been made for the Trijam#202: Free-for-all game jam!

For the Jam I took around 1 hour and 30 minutes to come up with the concept and write out my plan of action. (preparation)

Around 30 minutes to make all the assets

Around 2 hours  and 20 minutes- to program everything the way I wanted to.
